result.ga: cuir léine ghlan ort féin

result.html: cuir léine ghlan ort féinPut on a clean shirt.
result.ponchtml: cuir léine ġlan ort féinPut on a clean shirt.

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
